Privacy policy

JUZT LAB INC. (referred to as “JUZT LAB” “we,” “us,” or “our” herein) recognizes the importance of protecting the privacy of personal information collected from users of our Website. This Privacy Statement discloses how we collect, use, and share information gathered about users when they visit our Website. By accessing our Website, you are assenting to the terms of this Privacy Statement and the terms of the user agreement, located at juztlab.com/policies/terms-of-service, including without limitation, the limitation of liability provisions. A COPY OF THE PRIVACY POLICY MAY BE DOWNLOADED, STORED OR PRINTED.

Children

We are committed to protecting the on-line privacy of children. While this site is not designed or intended to attract children under the age of thirteen (13), we are mindful children may also visit this site. We do not collect personal information from children we know are under 13 years of age.

Information Collection And Use

We collect personally identifiable information, such as name, address, email address, and phone number from some areas on our Website. Below we describe the major areas on our Website from which we collect personal information. We collect personal information in order to respond and fulfill your requests for our products and to better meet customer needs. Currently we do not sell, share, or rent personal information collected from our users to third parties in ways different from what is disclosed in this Privacy Statement. However, we reserve our right to do so in the future. In addition, we may share your personal information with business partners that we have contracted with to help process orders and deliver products and services that you have requested.

Cookies

A “cookie” is a small file stored on your computer by a Website that gives users a numeric user identification and stores certain information about the user’s activity on the Website. We use cookies to let us know that the user is a prior customer and to provide certain features such as storage of the user’s password or user name. Most Web browsers automatically accept cookies, but most allow you to instruct your browser to prevent the use of cookies. However, if you disable this feature, certain aspects of our Website, such as the shopping cart, will not function properly.

Links

This Website contains links to other sites. Please be aware that we are not responsible for the privacy practices of other Web sites that you may link to from our Website. We ask our users to be aware that when they enter other Websites they will be subject to privacy practices that may differ from ours. We encourage you to read the privacy statement of each Website that you link to and that collects personally identifiable information. This Privacy Statement applies solely to information collected on the juztlab.com Website.

Purchasing Products

We use Shopify to manage the transaction purchase process. Any information you provide in connection with such transactions, including credit card information and other personal information, are managed through Shopify, and will be subject to Shopify’s Privacy Policy, Refund Policy and Terms of Use, which are accessible during the checkout process. We do not retain or share any such information.

Consent And Notification Of Changes

By using our Web site, you consent to the collection and use of personal information as described above. If we decide to change our Privacy Statement, we will post these changes so our users are always aware of what information we collect, how we use it and under what circumstances we disclose it. We encourage you to check this page from time to time because your continued use of this Website following any changes to the Privacy Policy will be deemed to constitute your acceptance of such changes.

Feedback

We very much welcome your questions, comments, and concerns about privacy. Please send us any and all feedback pertaining to this, or any other issue to juztlab.na@gmail.com
